news.title: Canadian government bans KNEECAP from entry over actions and statements "contrary to Canadian values"
news.summary: "When we beat you in court, which we will, we will donate every cent to assist some of the thousands of child amputees in Gaza," said KNEECAP in their response to the decision.

news.title: Frankie Goes To Hollywood and Pet Shop Boys episode of Hot Press Classics out now - feat. Arthur Baker
news.summary: Paul Nolan and Donny Keane say relax, as they revisit a brace of pop masterworks, Frankie Goes To Hollywood’s 1984 debut Welcome To The Pleasuredome and the Pet Shop Boys’ Introspective from 1988. Plus an interview with legendary producer Arthur Baker.

news.title: PREMIERE: Lola Young explores her new album I'm Only F**cking Myself track by track with Universal Music
news.summary: The new album is out today

news.title: Ed Sheeran debuts at No.1 on the Irish Albums Chart with Play
U2 win 2025 Woody Guthrie prize
news.summary: "U2 embodies the mission of the Woody Guthrie Prize, using music to confront injustice and inspire action," said Cady Shaw, senior director of the Woody Guthrie Center.

news.title: Sack sign deal with GMO- The Label and release double A Side single
news.summary: They are set to play The Depot Sessions, Dublin on October 11.

news.title: KNEECAP and Fontaines D.C. among over 400 artists removing their music from Israel
news.summary: "The historic precedent of effective artist action during apartheid South Africa and the apartheid, war crimes and genocide now being committed by the state of Israel renders the No Music For Genocide' campaign imperative," Massive Attack said.
